explains: adj. 野生的；凶猛的；阴郁的

sentences.en: A feral sweet pea clings to it for support.
sentences.cn: 一株野生的甜豌豆攀附而上，倚靠着它。

sentences.en: Boys and girls stuck in time, ageless, feral as a pack of wild dogs.
sentences.cn: 男孩和女孩都困陷在时间里，拥有不老的生命，凶猛得像一群野狗。

sentences.en: Quaritch turns from gazing out at the wall of forest, displaying a feral grin.
sentences.cn: Quaritch凝视墙外的森林，露出一个狂野的笑容。
